snippet: Pakistan’s government and its Supreme Court came closer to finalizing a draft of a letter to authorities in Switzerland that could theoretically revive corruption cases against President Asif Ali Zardari.
lead_paragraph: Pakistan’s government and its Supreme Court came closer to finalizing a draft of a letter to authorities in Switzerland that could theoretically revive corruption cases against President Asif Ali Zardari.

headline.seo: Battle Eases Between Pakistani Government and High Court
headline.main: Battle Eases Between Pakistani Government and High Court
headline.print_headline: Battle Eases Between Pakistani Government and High Court
